data.title: 北京铭仁财富国际咨询有限公司
data.body:
国际战略专家（International strategic experts），法学博士（Doctor of law）

         集团公司首席顾问（Chief advisor of the group company） 羅卿豪 （ QING HAO LUO）

         

        北京铭仁财富国际咨询有限公司总部位于北京，一家经政府批准设立开展经济贸易、文化、体育、教育咨询等各类企业服务的公司，

        成立以来拥有一批专业的企业服务团队,通过对政策法规的敏锐观察和判断以及严谨、细致、以打造中小企优质的生态服务圈为愿景，

        为企业实现更大的价值！专业的解决方案，高性价比服务团队响应速度快，关注客户的实际需求，致力于为客户提供切实可行的整体解决方案。

        在同等服务质量下，我们承诺较低的服务费用；同等服务费用，我们承诺较高的服务质量，

        从而提供真正高性价比的专业服务，成为您值得信赖的合作伙伴。   


       我们的目标：

       愿景：成为中小微企业创业发展首选一站式商务服务商，打造中小企优质的生态服务圈为愿景！ 


       理念：客户第一，诚信为本，优质服务，小胜靠智慧，大胜靠品德。


       使命：为客户创造价值；为公司创造效益；为员工创造未来。


       愿景：打造中小企优质的生态服务圈为愿景 。


       口号： 国际、风雨同济、不坠青云、再接再厉。
data.address: 四川成都市临江东路36号锦江花园城钻石座15楼
data.ebody:
The headquarters of Beijing Ming Ren wealth International Consulting Co., Ltd. is located in Beijing, a company approved by the government to establish business services, such as economic trade, culture, sports, education consulting, and so on. It has a group of professional enterprise service teams since its establishment. Build a high quality ecological service circle for SMEs to achieve greater value for enterprises. Professional solutions, high performance and cost-effective service teams respond quickly, pay attention to the actual needs of customers, and strive to provide practical and feasible solutions for customers. Under the same quality of service, we promise lower service costs; the same service cost, we promise high quality of service, so as to provide a truly cost-effective professional service, to become your trustworthy partner.

Our goal:

Vision: to become the first stop business service provider for small and micro enterprises, and create a high quality eco service circle for SMEs.

Philosophy: customer first, integrity based, quality service, small wins by wisdom, win by virtue.

Mission: create value for customers; create benefits for the company; create future for employees.

Vision: building a high quality ecological service circle for SMEs

Slogan: International, wind and rain Tongji, do not fall into Qingyun, make persistent efforts.
data.titleE: Beijing Ming Ren wealth International Consulting Co Ltd
